content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

###Iron Smelting Area at position(0,0)
Consists of two furnaces:
- Stone furnace at (0.0, 0.0) for smelting iron plates
- Stone furnace at (2.0, 0.0) for smelting iron plates

###Copper Smelting Area at position(4,4)
Consists of two furnaces:
- Stone furnace at (4.0, 4.0) for smelting copper plates
- Stone furnace at (6.0, 4.0) for smelting copper plates

###Inserter Assembly Line at position(23.5, 2.5)
Consists of:
- Assembling machine 1 at (23.5, 2.5) for crafting inserters
- Input wooden chest at (20.5, 2.5)
- Output wooden chest at (26.5, 2.5)
- Two burner inserters at (21.5, 2.5) and (25.5, 2.5) for moving items

###Power Generation System
Consists of:
- Offshore pump at (-9.5, 24.5) 
- Boiler at (-2.5, 24.0)
- Steam engine at (4.5, 24.5)
- Connected pipe network for water and steam
- Electric pole network connecting power consumers

###Research Lab Network
Multiple labs connected to electricity network at various positions, some currently without power

ERROR TIPS

### Errors when trying to insert items without having them in inventory
- Check inventory contents before attempting to insert items into entities
- Ensure required items are crafted or collected before insertion attempts

### Errors with power system fuel management
- Monitor boiler fuel levels regularly
- Collect coal before it runs completely out
- Keep sufficient coal in inventory for power system maintenance

### Errors in crafting due to missing prerequisites
- Ensure all required ingredients are available before attempting crafting
- For items requiring furnace smelting (like iron plates), collect from furnaces first before attempting to craft items needing those materials

### Assembly machine resource management
- Keep track of all required components for inserter assembly
- Ensure consistent supply of iron plates, iron gear wheels and electronic circuits
- Monitor assembly machine input inventory to maintain production flow
